quote_first: “You can take the 3:17 to Peterborough, where you’ll have to change and catch the
quote_last: for Doncaster, then change again. You’ll arrive in Hull at 6:32.”
title: Dougie Mortimer's Right Arm
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first:
“I have to hang up now,” Rosemary said. “I just wanted to know if there was any improvement.”
“No, there isn’t. It was nice of you to call.”
She hung up. It was
title: Rosemary's Baby
author: Ira Levin
